languages.text: "То, что ты творишь — не спасение. Прекрати вымещать свой страх на невинных — это не принесет ни облегчения мучений, ни избавления от страха".

traits.locale_text: "То, что ты творишь — не спасение. Прекрати вымещать свой страх на невинных — это не принесет ни облегчения мучений, ни избавления от страха".

languages.text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."
languages.original_text: "То, что ты творишь — не спасение. Прекрати вымещать свой страх на невинных — это не принесет ни облегчения мучений, ни избавления от страха".

traits.locale_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on innocents. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of the fear."
"What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on innocents. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of the fear."
"What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of the fear."
"What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of the fear."
"What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."
"What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

languages.text: "Was Ihr tut, ist keine Erlösung. Hört auf, Eure Angst an den Unschuldigen auszulassen. Das wird weder Euer Leid lindern, noch Euch von der Angst befreien."
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr tut, ist keine Erlösung. Hört auf, Eure Angst an den Unschuldigen auszulassen. Das wird weder Euer Leid lindern, noch Euch von der Angst befreien."

languages.text: « Ce que vous faites ne leur apportera pas le salut. Cessez de reporter votre peur sur des innocents. Cela ne soulagera pas vos souffrances et ne fera pas plus disparaître votre peur. »
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que vous faites ne leur apportera pas le salut. Cessez de reporter votre peur sur des innocents. Cela ne soulagera pas vos souffrances et ne fera pas plus disparaître votre peur. »

languages.text: “你的所作所为根本不是救赎，别把你的恐惧发泄在无辜的人身上。这既不能减轻你的痛苦，也不能消除你的恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: “你的所作所为根本不是救赎，别把你的恐惧发泄在无辜的人身上。这既不能减轻你的痛苦，也不能消除你的恐惧。”

languages.text: 「お前がしていることは救済ではない。罪のない者に己の恐怖をぶつけるのをやめるんだ。お前の苦しみを和らげることも、恐怖から解放されることもない」
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がしていることは救済ではない。罪のない者に己の恐怖をぶつけるのをやめるんだ。お前の苦しみを和らげることも、恐怖から解放されることもない」

languages.text: «Lo que está haciendo no es salvación. Deje de desahogar su miedo contra los inocentes. No aliviará su sufrimiento ni le librará del miedo».
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que está haciendo no es salvación. Deje de desahogar su miedo contra los inocentes. No aliviará su sufrimiento ni le librará del miedo».

languages.text: "Böyle yaparak kimseyi kurtarmıyorsun. Korkunu masumlardan çıkarmayı bırak. Bu yol ne acını hafifletir ne de korkunu."
languages.original_text: "What you are doing is no salvation. Stop taking your fear out on the innocent. It will neither ease your suffering nor rid you of fear."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle yaparak kimseyi kurtarmıyorsun. Korkunu masumlardan çıkarmayı bırak. Bu yol ne acını hafifletir ne de korkunu."
